name: Best Asian Massage (Day Spa Retreat)
address: Best Asian Massage (Day Spa Retreat), 5531 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3W2

featured_reviews.review_id: I was in on Monday and was greeted and served by Sophia. I had the best time ever! The room was clean and even had a shower to use before and after the treatment. I booked a one hour treatment. The massage was very thorough and very good. Like in any other establishment of this kind the girl wants to upsell the service when you are most vulnerable and decide with the wrong head! I agreed to a service and let me tell you what followed was worth every nickel and dime spent and even more. It was the best service that I had in my over 60 years experience. I will definitely be back to see Sophia the next time I'm in the city! Highly recommended!

featured_reviews.review_id: I had the worst experience from them . They are only good at welcoming customers from the door after that they don't care . I got admitted for a massage and the lady asked me to pay 80cad upfront before the massage started . I paid and she told me it is for 45mins . Once started she was just rushing and did not know how to massage within 15minutes she finished her massage and told me to go so I asked why , look at the time .. they don't speak english and she started raising voice with me telling me to go. I still stayed and asked her for refund but she did not refund me . Very poor service and not loyal to the money paid . Never ever try them again , totally bad experience .

featured_reviews.review_id: Awesome service , but you have to ask for choosing girls , I'm not sure if they have outcall massage I mean mobile massage to home, office or hotel , let me know if by chance you do mobile outcall massage , thanks

featured_reviews.review_id: I've had the best experience with Bonnie. I highly recommend her. She has a very authentic, pure, great personality and overall a very positive energy. Would definitely recommend this place. Definitely will not be my last  visit. In strong hopes to revisit and enjoy what this place has to offer furthermore. Keep it up!!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, thanks for the great feedback.  Are you able to let us know what day and time you visited so we can further improve our service. You can also come back for with additional incentive from us

featured_reviews.review_id: If there was less than a star I wouldn't give it to this place. I paid for half an hour and only got 20 minutes or less. They also do not speak English except by using translation. The time is up and their treatment is not respectful. It is as if you did not pay and as if you came for free. I came this time and I will never come and I do not recommend ever going.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are sorry you didn't have a good experience. Are you able to tell us when you came and who helped you? We can return your money and give you a free session

featured_reviews.review_id:
I went for a massage just an hour ago after calling and confirming with them whether I can be accommodated or not. The lady told me to come over and I felt like trying this place. It was my first time to go to this place.
When I arrived, she asked me to pay and I did. Also, she asked for $80 for 30 mins which I thought was not fair according to their rates on the website.
She started the massage and did it for 15 mins only and told me that we are done. On asking about the time which I checked at the starting of the massage, she said that she is tired today and want to go home.
Eventually, I expressed that am not happy about it and she freaked out at me saying that she doesn't care.
NEVER EVER GO HERE. There are many other good sensual massage spa in Vancouver and other areas. Try them out but not this one.
Thank you for your disgusting services, would never come back and would also not recommend to anyone.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi sir we are sorry to hear that you have a best experience.  I'm the manager and would like to follow up with you to fix the issue.  Can we schedule a call or can you send us who was helping you and what time you went there to dayspa5531@gmail.com
